verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> now there was רָעָב֩ <S%H7458><s%> Then there was a famine בִּימֵ֨י <S%H3117><s%> in the days דָוִ֜ד <S%H1732><s%> of David שָׁלֹ֣שׁ <S%H7969><s%> three שָׁנִ֗ים <S%H8141><s%> years שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> year אַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> after שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> year וַיְבַקֵּ֥שׁ <S%H1245><s%> enquired דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> and David אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> of יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD ס וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> answered יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> [It is] for Saul וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house הַדָּמִ֔ים <S%H1818><s%> and for [his] bloody עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> he הֵמִ֖ית <S%H4191><s%> because he slew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַגִּבְעֹנִֽים׃ <S%H1393><s%> the Gibeonites

וַיִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> called הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king לַגִּבְעֹנִ֖ים <S%H1393><s%> the Gibeonites וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> to וְהַגִּבְעֹנִ֞ים <S%H1393><s%> unto them (now the Gibeonites לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> were not מִבְּנֵ֧י <S%H1121><s%> [were] not of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הֵ֗מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> but מִיֶּ֣תֶר <S%H3499><s%> but of the remnant הָאֱמֹרִ֔י <S%H567><s%> of the Amorites וּבְנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> and the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel נִשְׁבְּע֣וּ <S%H7650><s%> had sworn לָהֶ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> like וַיְבַקֵּ֤שׁ <S%H1245><s%> sought שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> unto them and Saul לְהַכֹּתָ֔ם <S%H5221><s%> to slay בְּקַנֹּאת֥וֹ <S%H7065><s%> them in his zeal לִבְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> to the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וִיהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> Judah

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> Wherefore David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַגִּבְעֹנִ֔ים <S%H1393><s%> unto the Gibeonites מָ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> What אֶעֱשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> What shall I do לָכֶ֑ם וּבַמָּ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> and how אֲכַפֵּ֔ר <S%H3722><s%> for you? and wherewith shall I make the atonement וּבָרְכ֖וּ <S%H1288><s%> that ye may bless אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַחֲלַ֥ת <S%H5159><s%> the inheritance יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Jehovah

וַיֹּ֧אמְרוּ <S%H559><s%> said ל֣וֹ הַגִּבְעֹנִ֗ים <S%H1393><s%> And the Gibeonites אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> have [לִי כ] (לָ֜נוּ ק) כֶּ֤סֶף <S%H3701><s%> unto him We will have no silver וְזָהָב֙ <S%H2091><s%> nor gold עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> of שָׁא֣וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul וְעִם־ <S%H5973><s%> or בֵּית֔וֹ <S%H1004><s%> nor of his house וְאֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> no לָ֥נוּ אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> any man לְהָמִ֣ית <S%H4191><s%> neither for us shalt thou kill בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> in Israel וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said מָֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> whatever אַתֶּ֥ם <S%H859><s%> you אֹמְרִ֖ים <S%H559><s%> What ye shall say אֶעֱשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> [that] will I do לָכֶֽם׃

וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> And they answered אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king הָאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> The man אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who כִּלָּ֔נוּ <S%H3615><s%> that consumed וַאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> and who דִּמָּה־ <S%H1819><s%> us and that devised לָ֑נוּ נִשְׁמַ֕דְנוּ <S%H8045><s%> against us [that] we should be destroyed מֵֽהִתְיַצֵּ֖ב <S%H3320><s%> from remaining בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any גְּבֻ֥ל <S%H1366><s%> in any of the coasts יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

[יְנָתָן־ כ] (יֻתַּן־ <S%H5414><s%> be given לָ֜נוּ ק) שִׁבְעָ֤ה <S%H7651><s%> Let seven אֲנָשִׁים֙ <S%H376><s%> men מִבָּנָ֔יו <S%H1121><s%> of his sons וְהוֹקַֽעֲנוּם֙ <S%H3363><s%> unto us and we will hang them up לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD בְּגִבְעַ֥ת <S%H1390><s%> in Gibeah שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> of Saul בְּחִ֣יר <S%H972><s%> did choose יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> [whom] the LORD ס וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I אֶתֵּֽן׃ <S%H5414><s%> be delivered

וַיַּחְמֹ֣ל <S%H2550><s%> spared הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> But the king עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> because מְפִי־ <S%H4648><s%> Mephibosheth בֹ֖שֶׁת <S%H1322><s%> ashamed בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְהוֹנָתָ֣ן <S%H3083><s%> of Jonathan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שָׁא֑וּל <S%H7586><s%> of Saul עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> because שְׁבֻעַ֤ת <S%H7621><s%> oath יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> because of the LORD'S אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which בֵּֽינֹתָ֔ם <S%H996><s%> was between בֵּ֣ין <S%H996><s%> between דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> that [was] between them between David וּבֵ֖ין <S%H996><s%> was between יְהוֹנָתָ֥ן <S%H3083><s%> and Jonathan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שָׁאֽוּל׃ <S%H7586><s%> of Saul

וַיִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> took הַמֶּ֡לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> But the king אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁ֠נֵי <S%H8147><s%> the two בְּנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> sons רִצְפָּ֤ה <S%H7532><s%> of Rizpah בַת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter אַיָּה֙ <S%H345><s%> of Aiah אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whom יָלְדָ֣ה <S%H3205><s%> whom she bare לְשָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> unto Saul אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַרְמֹנִ֖י <S%H764><s%> Armoni וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מְפִבֹ֑שֶׁת <S%H4648><s%> and Mephibosheth וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲמֵ֗שֶׁת <S%H2568><s%> and the five בְּנֵי֙ <S%H1121><s%> sons מִיכַ֣ל <S%H4324><s%> of Michal בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> of Saul אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom יָלְדָ֛ה <S%H3205><s%> whom she brought up לְעַדְרִיאֵ֥ל <S%H5741><s%> for Adriel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son בַּרְזִלַּ֖י <S%H1271><s%> of Barzillai הַמְּחֹלָתִֽי׃ <S%H4259><s%> the Meholathite

וַֽיִּתְּנֵ֞ם <S%H5414><s%> And he delivered בְּיַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> them into the hands הַגִּבְעֹנִ֗ים <S%H1393><s%> of the Gibeonites וַיֹּקִיעֻ֤ם <S%H3363><s%> and they hanged בָּהָר֙ <S%H2022><s%> them in the hill לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַיִּפְּל֥וּ <S%H5307><s%> and they fell [שִׁבַעְתָּיִם כ] (שְׁבַעְתָּ֖ם <S%H7651><s%> seven ק) יָ֑חַד <S%H3162><s%> together [וְהֵם כ] (וְהֵ֨מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like ק) הֻמְת֜וּ <S%H4191><s%> and were put to death בִּימֵ֤י <S%H3117><s%> in the days קָצִיר֙ <S%H7105><s%> of harvest בָּרִ֣אשֹׁנִ֔ים <S%H7223><s%> in the first [תְחִלַּת כ] (בִּתְחִלַּ֖ת <S%H8462><s%> Tachmonite ק) קְצִ֥יר <S%H7105><s%> harvest שְׂעֹרִֽים׃ <S%H8184><s%> of barley

וַתִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> took רִצְפָּה֩ <S%H7532><s%> And Rizpah בַת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter אַיָּ֨ה <S%H345><s%> of Aiah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשַּׂ֜ק <S%H8242><s%> sackcloth וַתַּטֵּ֨הוּ <S%H5186><s%> and spread לָ֤הּ אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַצּוּר֙ <S%H6697><s%> it for her upon the rock מִתְּחִלַּ֣ת <S%H8462><s%> from the beginning קָצִ֔יר <S%H7105><s%> of harvest עַ֛ד <S%H5704><s%> until נִתַּךְ־ <S%H5413><s%> dropped מַ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> until water עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> and מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> upon them out of heaven וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> neither נָתְנָה֩ <S%H5414><s%> and suffered ע֨וֹף <S%H5775><s%> neither the birds הַשָּׁמַ֜יִם <S%H8064><s%> of the air לָנ֤וּחַ <S%H5117><s%> to rest עֲלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H5921><s%> on יוֹמָ֔ם <S%H3119><s%> on them by day וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חַיַּ֥ת <S%H2416><s%> nor the beasts הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> of the field לָֽיְלָה׃ <S%H3915><s%> by night

וַיֻּגַּ֖ד <S%H5046><s%> And it was told לְדָוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> David אֵ֧ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> what עָשְׂתָ֛ה <S%H6213><s%> had done רִצְפָּ֥ה <S%H7532><s%> what Rizpah בַת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter אַיָּ֖ה <S%H345><s%> of Aiah פִּלֶ֥גֶשׁ <S%H6370><s%> the concubine שָׁאֽוּל׃ <S%H7586><s%> of Saul

וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went דָּוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> And David וַיִּקַּ֞ח <S%H3947><s%> and took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַצְמ֤וֹת <S%H6106><s%> the bones שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> of Saul וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַצְמוֹת֙ <S%H6106><s%> and the bones יְהוֹנָתָ֣ן <S%H3083><s%> of Jonathan בְּנ֔וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son מֵאֵ֕ת <S%H853><s%> בַּעֲלֵ֖י <S%H1167><s%> from the men יָבֵ֣ישׁ <S%H3003><s%> Jobesh גִּלְעָ֑ד <S%H1568><s%> Gilead אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> who גָּנְב֨וּ <S%H1589><s%> which had stolen אֹתָ֜ם <S%H853><s%> מֵרְחֹ֣ב <S%H7339><s%> them from the street בֵּֽית־ שַׁ֗ן <S%H1052><s%> of Bethshan אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who [תְּלוּם כ] (תְּלָא֥וּם <S%H8518><s%> hang ק) [שָׁם כ] [הַפְּלִשְׁתִּים כ] (שָׁ֙מָּה֙ <S%H8033><s%> in it ק) (פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> the Philistines ק) בְּי֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> them when הַכּ֧וֹת <S%H5221><s%> had slain פְּלִשְׁתִּ֛ים <S%H6430><s%> where the Philistines אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul בַּגִּלְבֹּֽעַ׃ <S%H1533><s%> in Gilboa

וַיַּ֤עַל <S%H5927><s%> And he brought up מִשָּׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> there אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַצְמ֣וֹת <S%H6106><s%> from thence the bones שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> of Saul וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַצְמ֖וֹת <S%H6106><s%> and the bones יְהוֹנָתָ֣ן <S%H3083><s%> of Jonathan בְּנ֑וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son וַיַּ֣אַסְפ֔וּ <S%H622><s%> and they gathered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַצְמ֖וֹת <S%H6106><s%> the bones הַמּוּקָעִֽים׃ <S%H3363><s%> of them that were hanged

וַיִּקְבְּר֣וּ <S%H6912><s%> buried אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַצְמוֹת־ <S%H6106><s%> And the bones שָׁא֣וּל <S%H7586><s%> of Saul וִיהוֹנָֽתָן־ <S%H3083><s%> and Jonathan בְּ֠נוֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son בְּאֶ֨רֶץ <S%H776><s%> they in the country בִּנְיָמִ֜ן <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin בְּצֵלָ֗ע <S%H6762><s%> in Zelah בְּקֶ֙בֶר֙ <S%H6913><s%> in the sepulchre קִ֣ישׁ <S%H7027><s%> of Kish אָבִ֔יו <S%H1><s%> his father וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֔וּ <S%H6213><s%> and they performed כֹּ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֖ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> all that the king וַיֵּעָתֵ֧ר <S%H6279><s%> was intreated אֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> that God לָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> for the land אַֽחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> And after כֵֽן׃ <S%H3651><s%> after that פ

וַתְּהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> become ע֧וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again מִלְחָמָ֛ה <S%H4421><s%> had yet war לַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> Moreover the Philistines אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> against יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> again with Israel וַיֵּ֨רֶד <S%H3381><s%> went down דָּוִ֜ד <S%H1732><s%> and David וַעֲבָדָ֥יו <S%H5650><s%> and his servants עִמּ֛וֹ <S%H5973><s%> and as they וַיִּלָּחֲמ֥וּ <S%H3898><s%> with him and fought אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> against פְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> against the Philistines וַיָּ֥עַף <S%H5774><s%> waxed faint דָּוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> and David

[וְיִשְׁבֹּו כ] (וְיִשְׁבִּ֨י ק) בְּנֹ֜ב <S%H3430><s%> And Ishbibenob אֲשֶׁ֣ר ׀ <S%H834><s%> who בִּילִידֵ֣י <S%H3211><s%> which [was] of the sons הָרָפָ֗ה <S%H7497><s%> of the giant וּמִשְׁקַ֤ל <S%H4948><s%> the weight קֵינוֹ֙ <S%H7013><s%> of whose spear שְׁלֹ֤שׁ <S%H7969><s%> [weighed] three מֵאוֹת֙ <S%H3967><s%> hundred מִשְׁקַ֣ל <S%H4948><s%> in weight נְחֹ֔שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> [shekels] of brass וְה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he חָג֣וּר <S%H2296><s%> he being girded חֲדָשָׁ֑ה <S%H2319><s%> with a new וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> [sword] thought לְהַכּ֥וֹת <S%H5221><s%> to have slain אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> David

וַיַּֽעֲזָר־ <S%H5826><s%> succoured לוֹ֙ אֲבִישַׁ֣י <S%H52><s%> But Abishai בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son צְרוּיָ֔ה <S%H6870><s%> of Zeruiah וַיַּ֥ךְ <S%H5221><s%> him and smote אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֖י <S%H6430><s%> the Philistine וַיְמִיתֵ֑הוּ <S%H4191><s%> and killed אָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> Then נִשְׁבְּעוּ֩ <S%H7650><s%> sware אַנְשֵׁי־ <S%H376><s%> the men דָוִ֨ד <S%H1732><s%> of David ל֜וֹ לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> unto him saying לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> so תֵצֵ֨א <S%H3318><s%> Thou shalt go ע֤וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again אִתָּ֙נוּ֙ <S%H854><s%> for לַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> no more out with us to battle וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> so תְכַבֶּ֖ה <S%H3518><s%> that thou quench אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נֵ֥ר <S%H5216><s%> not the light יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel פ

וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came אַֽחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> And it came to pass after this כֵ֔ן <S%H3651><s%> this וַתְּהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> came ע֧וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again הַמִּלְחָמָ֛ה <S%H4421><s%> that there was again a battle בְּג֖וֹב <S%H1359><s%> at Gob עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6430><s%> with the Philistines אָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> then הִכָּ֗ה <S%H5221><s%> slew סִבְּכַי֙ <S%H5444><s%> then Sibbechai הַחֻ֣שָׁתִ֔י <S%H2843><s%> the Hushathite אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> סַ֕ף <S%H5593><s%> Saph אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> who בִּילִדֵ֥י <S%H3211><s%> which [was] of the sons הָרָפָֽה׃ <S%H7497><s%> of the giant פ

וַתְּהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> become ע֧וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again הַמִּלְחָמָ֛ה <S%H4421><s%> And there was again a battle בְּג֖וֹב <S%H1359><s%> in Gob עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6430><s%> with the Philistines וַיַּ֡ךְ <S%H5221><s%> slew אֶלְחָנָן֩ <S%H445><s%> where Elhanan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יַעְרֵ֨י אֹרְגִ֜ים <S%H3296><s%> of Jaareoregim בֵּ֣ית הַלַּחְמִ֗י <S%H1022><s%> a Bethlehemite אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> גָּלְיָ֣ת <S%H1555><s%> [the brother of] Goliath הַגִּתִּ֔י <S%H1663><s%> the Gittite וְעֵ֣ץ <S%H6086><s%> the staff חֲנִית֔וֹ <S%H2595><s%> of whose spear כִּמְנ֖וֹר <S%H4500><s%> beam אֹרְגִֽים׃ <S%H707><s%> [was] like a weaver's ס

וַתְּהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> become ע֥וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again מִלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> And there was yet a battle בְּגַ֑ת <S%H1661><s%> in Gath וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <S%H1961><s%> there was אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> where was a man [מָדִין כ] (מָדֹ֗ון <S%H4067><s%> stature ק) וְאֶצְבְּעֹ֣ת <S%H676><s%> fingers יָדָיו֩ <S%H3027><s%> that had on every hand וְאֶצְבְּעֹ֨ת <S%H676><s%> toes רַגְלָ֜יו <S%H7272><s%> and on every foot שֵׁ֣שׁ <S%H8337><s%> six וָשֵׁ֗שׁ <S%H8337><s%> six עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty וְאַרְבַּע֙ <S%H702><s%> four מִסְפָּ֔ר <S%H4557><s%> in number וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> also ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יֻלַּ֥ד <S%H3205><s%> and he also was born לְהָרָפָֽה׃ <S%H7497><s%> to the giant

וַיְחָרֵ֖ף <S%H2778><s%> And when he defied אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel וַיַּכֵּ֙הוּ֙ <S%H5221><s%> slew יְה֣וֹנָתָ֔ן <S%H3083><s%> Jonathan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son [שִׁמְעִי כ] (שִׁמְעָ֖ה <S%H8096><s%> Shimeah ק) אֲחִ֥י <S%H251><s%> the brother דָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> of David

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַרְבַּ֥עַת <S%H702><s%> These four אֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These יֻלְּד֥וּ <S%H3205><s%> were born לְהָרָפָ֖ה <S%H7497><s%> to the giant בְּגַ֑ת <S%H1661><s%> in Gath וַיִּפְּל֥וּ <S%H5307><s%> and fell בְיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> by the hand דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> of David וּבְיַ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> and by the hand עֲבָדָֽיו׃ <S%H5650><s%> of his servants פ
